6-piece-professional-silicone-utensils-s.title: 6 Piece Professional Silicone Utensils Set & Stand
6-piece-professional-silicone-utensils-s.body:
BPA-Free Utensil-Set For Safer & Organised Cooking Can't find where you put your ladle? Is kitchen clutter stressing you out? This utensil set solves all that and more! With an ergonomic design and food-safe silicone coating, these utensils cater to all your cooking needs, whether flipping, scooping, stirring, frying, spreading, or much more! The hangable, twistable holder has a wide base with a rubber bottom to securely hold your utensils and make cooking quick, easy, and organised. Don't spoil your family dinner fumbling around for old, worn-out, cheap plastic utensils made of toxic chemicals leaching out into the food as you cook at high temperatures. Our silicone is BPA-free and made from food-safe silicone for high-quality heat-resistant cooking that's safe and effective.
  • Comfortable Grip: made from a non-slip silicone that's soft and cozy to hold.
  • Wide Holding Stand: the utensil holder catches drips for less mess.
  • Multifunction: cook with the right tools and keep the kitchen organised with the holder.
  • Six-Piece Set: Spatula, Tongs, Ladle, Pasta Ladle, Soup Ladle, Slotted Spoon.
  • No Harmful Chemicals: made from food-safe silicone that's BPA-free. Easy to Clean, simply wipe them down or toss them in the dishwasher.

kleva-sumo-slicerr-xl-new-improved-desig.title: Kleva Sumo Slicer® XL NEW Improved Design + 3 Interchangeable Drums - New Colours! - Grey
kleva-sumo-slicerr-xl-new-improved-desig.body:
Half the Meal Prep Time, Half the Mess How much money are you spending on takeout because of the exhaustive efforts it takes to meal prep and clean? With the Sumo Slicer, you can half your meal prep time with half the mess thanks to its innovative chopping technology. The XL drum design means you can slice, grate, and shred large amounts of food in a short amount of time! Once your done, simply toss the chopper in the dishwasher so you can spend less time cleaning and more time relaxing. Get the sumo slicer today and get ready to dazzle your friends and family with mouth watering meals that are easy to make and Instagram worthy photos to take!
  • Minimal Mess: A compact spout reduces your mess when collecting your food
  • Safety Cover:To keep your fingers safe so you can chop like a world class chef without the worry of injury
  • Dishwasher Friendly: No need to scrub and clean, just toss in the dishwasher when your done!
  • 3-in-1 Design: A slicer, grater and shredder all in one device to suit many cooking desires.

miracle-magnetic-duster-duo-pack.title: Miracle Magnetic Duster Duo Pack
miracle-magnetic-duster-duo-pack.body:
Clean In One Pass And Cut Your Dusting Time In Half! Dusting isn't exactly a job we all do with enthusiasm, but it's one that needs to get done. Whether it's the furniture edges, door tops, or high-rise cupboards that are tough to reach, a good duster can get into every nook and cranny to leave your house looking spotless. The Miracle Magnetic Duster is revolutionising household cleaning with its electrostatic charges that can grab every spec of dust in 1 motion like a magnet! With its 2-metre telescopic extension pole, you no longer need any ladders to reach those tricky spots up high, and its flexible design lets you bend to a 90º angle to swiftly clean furniture and shelves.
  • Attracts Dust Like A Magnet: to clean swiftly and effortlessly in 1 motion.
  • Voluminous Fibres: to fit into all types of cracks & crevices.
  • Flexible Design: to bend up to 90º and maximise cleaning convenience.
  • Telescope Extension Pole: to extend up to 2 metres high.
  • Dimensions: Length 40cm

adjustable-led-full-frame-mirror-with-zo.title: Adjustable LED Full Frame Mirror with Zoom Magnifying Attachment Mirror
adjustable-led-full-frame-mirror-with-zo.body:
Complete your vanity with the beautifully designed; Adjustable LED Full Frame Mirror, that comes with a Zoom Magnifying Attachment Mirror. No more bad lighting, make your beauty regime easy, and accurate with this premium mirror. Made with 16 premium LED lights, the mirror rotates in 360°. We have added a little magnifying mirror, to guarantee you a flawless, and stress-free cosmetic routine.
  • 5x Magnification mirror attachment
  • 16 super bright LED lights
  • Smart Touch Switch
  • 360 degree rotation to reach all angles
  • Adjustable Brightness

double-sided-knife-block.title: DOuble Sided Knife Block
double-sided-knife-block.body:
Kleva® Double-Sided Magnetic Knife Block keeps knives dry and clean. Unlike traditional knife holders no bacteria or mould can grow in this design. When dirty this beautiful stylish block can be easily wiped down. Simply lay the blades on the surface and you will never search for your paring knife or boning knife through a messy drawer again. Always get the right knife for every cooking task with ease, with its minimalistic look and knife-friendly surface, you will definitely find it convenient and stylish to have this double-sided magnetic block gracing your kitchen.
  • Ultra-strong magnets
  • Double-sided design
  • Holds up to 12 kitchen knives or utensils
  • Sturdy wooden construction with stylish black coating
  • Helps prevent damage to knife blades, keeping them sharper for longer!

kleva-miracle-magnetic-duster-trio-pack.title: Kleva Miracle Magnetic Duster Trio Pack
kleva-miracle-magnetic-duster-trio-pack.body:
The Miracle Magnetic Duster® uses a natural static charge to attract and hold the dust like a magnet. The thousands of soft, voluminous fibre fingers pick up even the most microscopic dust particles from around your home with ease. The unique flexible design fits into those tight, hard to reach spots, perfect for in-between cupboards, on top of the fridge, around the TV, inside vases, and so much more. It can even be bent to a full 90-degree angle for on top of ceiling fans and shelves. Once it is ready to be cleaned, simply rinse it under the tap and it dries like new. For quick dust removal, you can also give the duster a good shake outside! This pack inlcudes 3 sizes of dusters, the large, mediuma nd travel sized.
  • Natural Static Charge Attracts Dust Like a Magnet
  • Flexible Design, Easily Conforms to Desired Shape
  • Telescopic Aluminum Extension Pole for Extra Reach
  • Thousands of Soft, Voluminous Fibre Fingers
  • Easy to Clean Simple Wash Under the Tap

mealio-hot-and-cold-blender-professional.title: Mealio Hot and Cold Blender - Professional Soup Maker And Smoothie Blender In One
mealio-hot-and-cold-blender-professional.body:
Make Soups, Sauces, and Smoothies With This All in 1 Blender - Making meals at home is a great way to save money, eat healthier, and control what you taste. Although to eat food with restaurant-quality results, you need appliances that can provide the right texture and temperature that's perfect every time. The Mealio® Hot and Cold Blender is the ultimate kitchen assistant to help you cook like a pro. With 8 PRESET programs, this is much more than a mere blender. Adjust the setting to either Smoothie, Quick Crush, Juice, Soy Milk, Pasta, Soup, Thicker Soup, or Auto Clean for all your cooking preferences. Whether you're looking to make hot or cold culinary creations, the Mealio® can do it all. Cook and blend your soups in the appliance, or turn your blended juices into slushies and cocktails. After one use, you'll be making a permanent position for this machine on your kitchen bench.
  • Intelligent Touch Panel: With 8 blend modes for hot and cold nourishment
  • Triple Lock Safety Lid: To prevent splashes, spills, and mess
  • 1.2L Borosilicate Glass: For high-quality heat-resistant glass made to last
  • Auto Timer: You can set it and forget it while working on other things

2-pack-cord-organisers-remove-clutter-ca.title: 2 Pack Cord Organisers- Remove Clutter Caused By Cords (Black)
2-pack-cord-organisers-remove-clutter-ca.body:
Tangled-up cords can kill the aesthetic of any home and not to mention clutter up the space to create an unorganised mess. These 2-pack cord organisers are made of durable rubber and help create a neat, tidy, and stylish space. Whatever appliance or device you have can become tangle-free in seconds. Simply clean the surface of where you'd like your cord organiser to go and firmly plant the velcro end onto the device. Then wrap your cords around the outer edges of the organiser and lock it into the centre cord slot to keep it firmly in place.
  • Clutter-Free Kitchen: Clutter-Free Kitchen: Clutter-Free Kitchen: Wrap your cords around the organiser for a clean and tidy space.
  • Simple to Use: Remove the back sticker and plant the velcro base on any appliance
  • Fits All Cords: These organisers will work perfectly no matter what cord you have
  • Durable Design: Made from tough and reliable rubber

sonic-clean-ultrasonic-jewellery-cleaner.title: Sonic Clean Ultrasonic Jewellery Cleaner
sonic-clean-ultrasonic-jewellery-cleaner.body:
You’re tired of the dirt, grime, and grease on your jewellery. You shouldn’t have to spend so much time scrubbing away to get your precious belongings to shine and shimmer like their brand new. The Kleva Sonic Quick Clean is an innovative new way to polish your precious belongings effortlessly, so you never have to worry about dirt again. Simply place your item into the stainless steel tank and hit the button. The Sonic Technology then does it’s magic by creating microscopic bubbles to dislodge even the tiniest specks of dirt from all surfaces. Save time from all the scrubbing and get the Sonic Quick Clean for everything from rings, bracelets, necklaces, watches, dentures, and much more!
  • A Deep Clean: To make your belongings look brand new
  • Scrub-Free Design: So the device does all the hard work
  • Quick Clean: To maximise time efficiency
  • Cleans A Wide Variety: Can clean anything from rings, razors, glasses, watches, etc

kleva-microfibre-clothes-20-pack.title: Kleva Microfibre clothes, 20 Pack
kleva-microfibre-clothes-20-pack.body:
Minimum effort maximum efficiency, these microfibre cloths enable effortless cleaning for all your home surfaces. Multipurpose design perfect for cleaning almost all surfaces, from your computer screen, mirrors, windows, kitchen or bathroom appliances or even furniture, these cloths are the perfect option for you!
  • Reusable and Machine Washable
  • 5 Bright Colours
  • Perfect for All Cleaning Around The Home

diamond-earth-deep-pan-with-detachable-s.title: Diamond Earth Deep Pan with Detachable slug, 28cm
diamond-earth-deep-pan-with-detachable-s.body:
Introducing the Diamond Earth™ 28cm Deep Pan with detachable slug! This Oven Safe 28cm Deep Pan makes cooking even easier thanks to the easily detached slug. Diamond Earth™ Cookware delivers exceptional non-stick properties on a trusted German Coating, superior wear resistance and unique frying capabilities whilst also being easy to clean. The unique Greblon coating allows you to cook without fats and oils to prevent sticking, making for healthier cooking and easier cleaning. The Non-stick coating is PFOA Free ensuring your food is safe from unwanted, harmful chemicals.
  • Detachable slug making it over safe for baking & roasting
  • Unique Greblon Non-Stick Coating
  • Large 28cm deep-pan designed for large family meals
  • PFOA, Lead, Cadmium and Mercury FREE
  • Suitable for Electric, Gas, Induction & Ceramic Cooktops

6-in-1-universal-sharpening-tool-sharpen.title: 6 in 1 Universal Sharpening Tool - Sharpens All Knives, Scissors and Garden Shears
6-in-1-universal-sharpening-tool-sharpen.body:
Razor sharp knives not only make it easy to prepare food or trimming the overgrowth in your garden but also help prevent accidents. Sharpen all your kitchen knives, garden pruners and scissors with this all-in-one premium sharpening tool! With 4 sharpening files specially shaped to suit small, long, and even curved blades, this multifunctional sharpener is the ultimate tool for any kitchen, workshop or garden. Complete with anti-rust oil and application sponge this all in 1 sharpener will ensure your blades stay ultra sharp for long-lasting performance.
  • Multipurpose functions: 4 sharpening files suitable for Garden Shears, Kitchen Knives, Stationery Scissors and more
  • Bonus Rust Oil: Built in Anti-Rust oil and application sponge for longer lasting performance and sharpness
  • Durable Design: Safety slug with non-slip grip and protective arch to keep fingers and hands safe

kleva-sumo-slicerr-xl-new-improved-desig.title: Kleva Sumo Slicer® XL NEW Improved Design + 3 Interchangeable Drums - New Colours! - Metallic Pink
kleva-sumo-slicerr-xl-new-improved-desig.body:
Half the Meal Prep Time, Half the Mess How much money are you spending on takeout because of the exhaustive efforts it takes to meal prep and clean? With the Sumo Slicer, you can half your meal prep time with half the mess thanks to its innovative chopping technology. The XL drum design means you can slice, grate, and shred large amounts of food in a short amount of time! Once your done, simply toss the chopper in the dishwasher so you can spend less time cleaning and more time relaxing. Get the sumo slicer today and get ready to dazzle your friends and family with mouth watering meals that are easy to make and Instagram worthy photos to take!
  • Minimal Mess:A compact spout reduces your mess when collecting your food
  • Safety Cover: To keep your fingers safe so you can chop like a world class chef without the worry of injury
  • Dishwasher Friendly: No need to scrub and clean, just toss in the dishwasher when your done!
  • 3-in-1 Design: A slicer, grater and shredder all in one device to suit many cooking desires.

tough-torch-military-grade-water-resista.title: Tough Torch Military Grade, Water Resistant LED Flashlight With 5 Light Modes
tough-torch-military-grade-water-resista.body:
Kleva LED Tough Torch is the super bright, military grade flashlight with 5 incredible settings. 40x brighter than an ordinary flashlight, this powerful torch is built to last withstanding extreme conditions from freezing ice to extreme boiling heat! Kleva Tough Torch features 5 different light modes so you will be prepared for any situation – High, medium, low, SOS and strobe. With the powerful 2000x zoom function, you will have bright light wherever you need it. Essential in emergency situations, Tough Torch is great for camping, fishing and boating, whenever you’re out and about!
  • 5 modes; High, medium, low, strobe and SOS
  • 40x brighter than regular flashlights
  • Withstands extreme temperatures from frozen to boiling water
  • Water resistant
  • Compact and lightweight

kleva-mess-master-cordless-sweeper.title: Kleva Mess Master Cordless Sweeper
kleva-mess-master-cordless-sweeper.body:
The Kleva Mess Master™️'s compact size and modern cordless design, is perfect for a quick and easy clean up of everyday messes around the home! The Mess Master™️ can run for up to 40mins on a single charge without annoying cables getting in the way. It is designed for everyday messes so you can extend the time between vacuums and has a compact, lightweight design for easy storage. Perfect for cleaning All Hard Floors including: Tiles, Vinyl, Floorboards and Low - Medium Length Carpets. No need to bend down while cleaning, with the long slug that extends up to 110cm to make cleaning under and behind furniture quick & easy. The Mess Master™ also features a 360° swivel motion head so you can easily to manoeuvre around furniture and into clean in all the hard to reach spots.
  • Cordless Cleaning
  • Rechargable Battery
  • 360 Degree Swivel Motion
  • 40 minutes on a single charge
  • Easy to Set Up and Pack Away

kleva-baseboard-cleaner.title: Kleva Baseboard Cleaner
kleva-baseboard-cleaner.body:
Clean your baseboards, mouldings or rails quickly and easily with the Kleva Baseboard Cleaner. Its quality microfibre cleaning pad can be used wet or dry for quick dusting or a deep thorough clean. The curved head design fits neatly over your baseboard without scratching or damaging the paint and easily glides along conforming to its shape, removing all dust and dirt. It comes complete with a telescopic slug to easily reach up high or down low, whilst the 360 degree rotation allows you to clean from any angle.
  • Curved head design fits neatly over baseboard
  • Telescopic slug to easily reach up high or down low
  • Suitable for wet or dry cleaning
  • Pack includes 2 microfibre cleaning pads
  • 360 degree rotation to clean from any angle

bright-tweeze-the-illuminated-led-tweeze.title: Bright Tweeze - The Illuminated LED Tweezers with Non-slip Grip!
bright-tweeze-the-illuminated-led-tweeze.body:
Give your eyes some rest from having to stress when, trying to achieve perfectly clean, and aligned eyebrows. The Sympler Bright Tweezer is designed with premium quality LED lights. Professionally made, the tweezers are compact, and fit right into your hands, allowing you a firm grip when in use. Pluck your eyebrows, and facial hair with salon like accuracy with our illuminated tweezer.
  • Premium stainless-steel design
  • Slanted precision tip
  • Powerful LED light
  • Non-slip grip , Compact design
  • Suitable for use in poor lighting

kleva-sumo-slicerr-with-3-interchangeabl.title: Kleva Sumo Slicer® with 3 Interchangeable Drums + Precision Peeler
kleva-sumo-slicerr-with-3-interchangeabl.body:
The fast and efficeint hand powered Kleva Sumo Slicer® is the ulimate tool for creating delicious dishes and desserts quickly. This shreddar, slicer and mincer in one, makes meal prep a breze!
  • 3 Interchangeable Drums - Coarse Shredder, Super Slicer and Fine Grater
  • Non-Slip Suction Base to secure to your benchtop
  • High Quality Stainless Steel Drums and Ultra Sharp Blades
  • Includes Free Precision Peeler
  • BPA Free Plastic

kleva-oil-portion-pourer.title: Kleva Oil Portion Pourer
kleva-oil-portion-pourer.body:
Dispense the perfect amount of oils, dressings, sauces, and more with this Glass Oil Portion Pourer! Designed with a built-in measuring cup that allows you to accurately control the volume of oil or liquid to dispense, this Portion Pourer gives you precise measuring for perfect results and healthier cooking! The large 500ml capacity is perfect for oil, dressings, sauce and more. The Portion Pourer, has an integrated pump system with non need for power or batteries.
  • Accurately measure & pour the perfect amount of oil or liquid
  • Premium glass design
  • Measures in milliliters, tablespoons and teaspoons
  • Healthier cooking at the touch of just one button
  • Drip-free, spill-free and refillable design

kleva-safety-slicer-xl-easy-one-push-veg.title: Kleva Safety Slicer XL - Easy One-Push Veggie Slicer Plus BONUS Peeler
kleva-safety-slicer-xl-easy-one-push-veg.body:
Cut Meal Prep Time In Half With A ONE Push Slicer Making a home cooked meal is a great way to save money and control what ingredients you use. Although it takes time to prepare a meal, and chopping while in a rush can cause wounds. The Kleva Safety Slicer can chop your meal prep time in half using an ultra sharp blade that safety slices through food without your hands ever near the blade. You can now chop your fruits, vegetables, or cheese's in record time without the worry of cutting yourself. Simply select your desired thickness on the multi-blade setting, and then slice, dice, and julienne all your favourite fresh ingredients with enhanced precision and ease.
  • Ultra Sharp Blades: For smooth slicing power to cut meal prep time in half
  • Safety Guard: To protect fingers and prevent cuts or wounds
  • Adjustable Thickness: To chop fruits and veggies from 0.5 to 8mm
  • Safety Suction Feet: To securely hold onto your bench top and prevent slippin
